meta.name: description
meta.content: At Northside ISD we believe every student deserves the highest quality education. Students are offered an education which honors their voice and prepares them to engage, contribute, and succeed.
At Northside ISD we believe every student deserves the highest quality education. Students are offered an education which honors their voice and prepares them to engage, contribute, and succeed.

link.title: Northside Independent School District | San Antonio, TX

img.alt: A message to the class of 2020 with background pix of crowd of graduates in cap and gown

div.class: equal field field--name-field-block field--type-entity-reference field--label-hidden field--items
col-sm-3 field--item cta-section animated block-type-block-info-card skewed
col-sm-3 field--item cta-section animated block-type-block-info-card skewed
col-sm-3 field--item cta-section animated block-type-block-info-card skewed
col-sm-3 field--item cta-section animated block-type-block-info-card skewed
lr-padding pt-0 pb-20 blackish-bg-color row bs-1col

section.data-layout-content-preview-placeholder-: "San Antonio's largest school district of choice" block
section.h2: San Antonio's largest school district of choice

div.class: lr-padding pt-10 pb-0 blackish-bg-color equal special-gutters row bs-4col

div.p: We foster an environment where highly qualified educators inspire and motivate students.

img.alt: Student holding his diploma at graduation

div.p: We lay the foundation for students to succeed in college, career, or the military.

img.alt: Girl looking at her science experiment

section.div: We offer a variety of academic programs designed to engage all students.
We recognize all students’ individualized needs in an inclusive environment.

div.class: row equal special-gutters views-row clearfix row-1

img.alt: Governor orders distance learning through end of school year

span.a: Online learning to continue through the end of the 2019-2020 school year

img.alt: collage of custodian, Dr. Woods and child at home on computer

span.a: Dr. Woods offers words of support to families

img.alt: Grading guidelines for distance learning with young boy at computer

div.class: row equal special-gutters views-row clearfix row-2

img.alt: NISD counselors ready to offer support with student and teacher on phone pictures
NISD continues to issue devices and feed kids

span.a: NISD continues to issue devices and feed kids

div.class: col-sm-offset-8 pt-30 col-sm-4 text-right bs-region bs-region--bottom-right

div.p: #NISDFamily- please read this message about graduation from Dr. Woods to the Class of 2020- https://t.co/w2M2FClyBk https://t.co/LEd0hUZT80
#NISDFamily- Even though tomorrow is a holiday, meal distribution continues. Have a safe and happy three-day weeken… https://t.co/qi5cFhaPW6

div.class: lr-padding default-font-color students-dark-bg-color edge--top--reverse row bs-3col-bricked

section.data-layout-content-preview-placeholder-: "Your future starts in Northside ISD" block
section.h2: Your future starts in Northside ISD

div.p: Established in 1949 by the consolidation of 12 rural school districts, Northside Independent School District (NISD) today is 355 square miles of urban landscape, suburban communities, and rural Texas hill country. In addition to the 120 public schools (including seven specialized magnet programs) that NISD operates, northwest Bexar County is also a higher education and research center magnet.

We believe every student deserves the highest quality education and it’s our mission to transform their learning experience. We know the keys to student success are dedicated, passionate teachers engaging with students and giving each one the opportunity to create and learn in new and exciting ways. We also know those relationships between students, families, educators, and the community are vital for student success and help each student find their voice so they can contribute and engage in their communities now and in the future.

Northside is home to more than 106,000 students in 120 schools, including our high school and middle school magnets, helping every student grow in confidence, curiosity, and capability. Each student can choose from unique graduation plans ensuring all students have the opportunity to learn and succeed.

div.class: col-sm-v col-xs-12 row col-sm-4 bs-region bs-region--top-left

div.p: The Northside ISD Police Department operates 24-hours a day and is dedicated to the safety and welfare of all students, faculty, staff and visitors of the District and the protection of District property.

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-8 col-xs-12 bs-region bs-region--middle

section.data-layout-content-preview-placeholder-: "Contact Us - goes to contact page" block

section.div: Do you have any questions or comments?

div.p: NISD-TV produces a variety of informational and promotional videos about Northside's educational programs, schools, staff members, students, challenges and successes. The professional staff at NISD-TV have been recognized with numerous awards from the Texas School Public Relations Association.
